text: Which of the following relation(s) is/are not an equivalence relation? (@) The relation R on Z defined by aRb if and only ifa® — b = 7. (b) The relation R on Z defined by aRb if and only if 2a + 5b =0 (mod 7). (0)The relation R on Z defined by aRb if and only ifa + b =0 (mod 5). (d)The relation R on Z defined by aRb if and only ifa® + b2 = 0.
